resources.string: In our town, you will find accommodations ranging from 35000 COP to luxurious cabins equipped with all the elements to promote a restorative rest. Visit us.

The municipality of San Rafael was founded on August 5, 1864, by miners coming from the Paisa regions of Santa Rosa de Osos and San Carlos attracted by the abundance of gold in the area. The nascent population was first known as La Cuchilla.
In San Rafael, we have numerous restaurants that revive the essence of the local gastronomy, offering several dishes that will delight your palate.
In San Rafael, we have paradisiacal wonders: streams, waterfalls, and other sites with emerald beauty.
The creator of this application, Yordan Miguel, seeks to expand the cultural knowledge of the beautiful towns that Colombia contains.
